languages.text: {n}Ваш исполненный мистической многозначительности ответ явно пришелся по душе культисту. Горделиво улыбнувшись, он отвечает:{/n} "Пусть владыка ослепит и тебя, {mf|брат|сестра}".
{n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш исполненный мистической многозначительности ответ явно пришелся по душе культисту. Горделиво улыбнувшись, он отвечает:{/n} "Пусть владыка ослепит и тебя, {mf|брат|сестра}".

{n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

languages.text: {n}Deine Antwort, durchzogen von mystischer Bedeutung, gefällt dem Kultisten offenbar. Er lächelt hochmütig und sagt:{/n} "Möge auch Euer Meister Euch blind machen, {mf|Brud|Schwest}er."
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Antwort, durchzogen von mystischer Bedeutung, gefällt dem Kultisten offenbar. Er lächelt hochmütig und sagt:{/n} "Möge auch Euer Meister Euch blind machen, {mf|Brud|Schwest}er."

languages.text: {n}Le cultiste apprécie manifestement votre tirade nimbée de signification mystique. Il vous sourit d'un air arrogant avant de rétorquer :{/n} « Que notre maître vous aveugle vous aussi, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cultiste apprécie manifestement votre tirade nimbée de signification mystique. Il vous sourit d'un air arrogant avant de rétorquer :{/n} « Que notre maître vous aveugle vous aussi, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »

languages.text: {n}你的回答充满了神秘的暗示，让这个邪教徒欣喜不已。他傲慢地笑了起来。{/n}“愿我们的主人也蒙蔽你的双眼，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的回答充满了神秘的暗示，让这个邪教徒欣喜不已。他傲慢地笑了起来。{/n}“愿我们的主人也蒙蔽你的双眼，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”

languages.text: {n}謎めいた意味合いを含んだその返事は、まさに狂信者好みだったようだ。男は偉そうに笑って言う。{/n}「主がお前も盲目にしてくださいますように、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}ミステリアスな意味を含んだその返事は、まさに魔女団の信者好みだったようだ。男は偉そうに笑って言う。{/n}「主が君も盲目にしますように、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}よ」

languages.text: {n}Tu respuesta, impregnada de significado místico, fue evidentemente del agrado del cultista. Sonríe altivamente y dice,{/n} «Que nuestro Maestro te ciegue a ti también, {mf|hermano|hermana}».
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu respuesta, impregnada de significado místico, fue evidentemente del agrado del cultista. Sonríe altivamente y dice,{/n} «Que nuestro Maestro te ciegue a ti también, {mf|hermano|hermana}».

languages.text: {n}Gizemli bir mana içeren yanıtın, belli ki tarikatçının hoşuna gidiyor. Mağrurca gülümseyerek konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Efendimiz, senin gözlerini de böylesine kör etsin kardeşim."
languages.original_text: {n}Your reply, imbued with mystical significance, was evidently to the cultist's liking. He smiles haughtily and says,{/n} "May our Master blind you too, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gizemli bir mana içeren yanıtın, belli ki tarikatçının hoşuna gidiyor. Mağrurca gülümseyerek konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Efendimiz, senin gözlerini de böylesine kör etsin kardeşim."
